seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without seniority indicator, but comprehensive skill requirements (ETL, cloud, multiple programming languages, big data) suggest mid-level rather than entry level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer', core responsibilities focus on data integration, ETL, data warehousing, and data migration

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary focus on ETL tool Informatica PowerCenter, data warehousing, and data migration - classic batch ETL patterns

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or management responsibilities - pure individual contributor role

primary_cloud.evidence: MS-Azure Cloud mentioned as preferred experience, cloud skills required, data migration on cloud mentioned

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only Azure mentioned specifically, no other cloud providers referenced

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL tool Informatica PowerCenter is primarily batch-oriented, data warehousing suggests batch processing patterns

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned (Airflow, Spark, etc.)

storage_layer.evidence: Data warehousing mentioned as core requirement, business intelligence focus suggests warehouse patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra, India - suggests on-site or local requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: Location in India (Navi Mumbai) indicates Asia-Pacific timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Specific location already mentioned (Navi Mumbai), no relocation package or moving requirements stated

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, location in India suggests local hiring without international visa support

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, location in India suggests local work authorization requirements

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, but location specificity suggests work authorization in India required

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No employment type or contract structure mentioned in posting

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements appear reasonable for data engineering role, no unrealistic combinations or excessive years of experience demanded
